title: Advanced Mathematics Collaborative Project Utilizing Minecraft

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Mathematics Knowledge (Algebra, Geometry), Collaborative Learning Experience, and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Current practitioners apply mathematical concepts to real-world job problems and collaborate in a constrained environment using a smartphone-based Minecraft application.

learning_goals: Over 90% of learners demonstrate geometric modeling skills in three-dimensional space through Minecraft projects.
Each team completes at least one math-based structural design project and achieves a peer evaluation score of 4 or higher (out of 5).
During collaboration, learners document and analyze at least three activities related to 21st-century competencies (communication, problem-solving, creativity) per individual.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
